title: Microsoft | L61 | HYDERABAD  | Offer | Need Suggestion
content:
Education: BTech Computer Science Tier 3
Years of Experience: 4 YOE
Prior Experience: Senior Software Engineer ( FINTECH )
Current : 27.5 LPA Fixed + Perf Bonus

Company: MICROSOFT
Title/Level: L61
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: 30 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 70k USD for 4 Years
Bonus: 0- 20% 

I don't have any other offers, and I've already negotiated twice to reach this one. I'm uncertain about accepting it because I believe my current company might offer 35 LPA to retain me. What should I do? What do you guys suggest?
